intro.introDescription: You will hear a low tone as the root note, followed by a sequence of notes. You need to select the corresponding interval based on what you hear. In the settings at the top right corner, you can adjust the volume and practice content.

home.title: Sequence Trainer
home.OpenSourceMessage: This is open source. Feel free to visit the GitHub repository to raise feature requests.

settings.DeleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete all local statistics data? This action cannot be undone.

sequenceTrainer.confirmDeleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete all local statistics data? This action cannot be undone.

messages.introDescription: You will hear a low tone as the root note, followed by a sequence of notes. You need to select the corresponding interval based on what you hear. In the settings at the top right corner, you can adjust the volume and practice content.
messages.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete all local statistics data? This action cannot be undone.
